name: TicTacGo™
0:
”Alexa, open Tic Tac Go”
”Alexa, start Tic Tac Go”
”Alexa, launch Tic Tac Go”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: tic tac go
Developer Terms of Use
des:
In Tic Tac Go™, players try to outsmart the ToyBot™ by getting three in a row. But beware, the ToyBot can be sneaky so pay attention to ensure you win! The positions are referred to as follows:

Tic Tac Go
Train / Top Left | Taxi / Top | Helicopter Top Right
School Bus / Left | Police Car / Center | Sail Boat / Right
Airplane / Bottom Left | Motorcycle / Bottom | Monster Truck / Bottom Right

This game can be played by younger kids who haven’t yet learned their left from their right!

Note: You can change the difficulty level by saying “change difficulty” for hours of fun!

About SayKid
SayKid combines voice technology with tangible play to help kids learn in an actively-engaging way - without screens! SayKid won the Grand Prize in the Amazon Alexa EdTech Challenge, has been recognized by Harvard, and was the subject of a recent TEDx Talk: “Can a Toy Transform Education?”

For more screen-free educational experiences, search "SayKid" on the Alexa Skill Store. If you enjoyed this game, we’d be so grateful if you could leave us a review!
priv:
